statements: SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT user_id, transaction_type FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = '234e5678-f90a-34b4-b567-789910111213' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC, transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY average_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type='credit' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT amount, transaction_type FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-06-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, sum(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, user_name, balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_type FROM transactions_history WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM currency_rates WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0 ORDER BY currency_code;
SELECT transaction_id, from_currency, to_currency, amount * conversion_rate AS converted_amount FROM currency_transactions;
